Package com.github.actionfx.core.validation

Class ValidationOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.actionfx.core.validation.ValidationOptions
  • public class ValidationOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration object for a single control and value validation.
    Author:
    koster

    • Method Detail

      • options

        public static ValidationOptions options()
        Creates a new ValidationOptions instance for building.
        Returns:
        the ValidationOptions instance

      • validationMode

        public ValidationOptions validationMode​(ValidationMode validationMode)
        Defines, when the actual validation is performed.

        Possible options are:

        • ValidationMode.ONCHANGE: Validation is applied, when a change occurs in a control that holds any validation annotation.
        • ValidationMode.MANUAL: Validation occurs only, when an explicit call to ActionFX.validate(Object) is performed.
        Parameters:
        validationMode - the validation mode. Default is ValidationMode.ONCHANGE.
        Returns:
        this builder

      • required

        public ValidationOptions required​(boolean required)
        Indicates whether the control value is mandatory and needs to hold a value.
        Parameters:
        required - true, if the control value needs to have a value, false otherwise. Default is false, if not set by this builder method.
        Returns:
        this builder

      • validationStartTimeoutMs

        public ValidationOptions validationStartTimeoutMs​(int validationStartTimeoutMs)
        Defines the timeout in milliseconds that has to pass after changing a control value, before the actual validation is applied to.

        This value is only used, if validation mode ValidationMode.ONCHANGE is supplied in attribute validationMode(ValidationMode).

        Parameters:
        validationStartTimeoutMs - the timeout value in milliseconds. Default is 100.
        Returns:
        this builder

      • applyValidationResultDecorations

        public ValidationOptions applyValidationResultDecorations​(boolean applyValidationResultDecorations)
        Indicates whether validation errors shall be displayed as decorations, when there is a validation failure.
        Parameters:
        applyValidationResultDecorations - true, if validation decorations shall be applied to affected controls, false otherwise. Default is true, if not set by this builder method.
        Returns:
        this builder

      • getValidationMode

        public ValidationMode getValidationMode()

      • isRequired

        public boolean isRequired()

      • getValidationStartTimeoutMs

        public int getValidationStartTimeoutMs()

      • isApplyValidationResultDecorations

        public boolean isApplyValidationResultDecorations()

      • determineValidationMode

        protected ValidationMode determineValidationMode()
        Checks, if a global validation mode is set (this will be used as default). If no global validation mode is set, this method returns ValidationMode.MANUAL.
        Returns:
        the determined validation mode

      • determineValidationStartTimeoutMs

        protected int determineValidationStartTimeoutMs()
        Checks, if a global validation start timeout is defined.
        Returns:
        the globally defined validation timeout (or -1, if there is not global timeout defined).

      • determineValidationApplyResultDecoration

        protected boolean determineValidationApplyResultDecoration()
        Checks, if validation decorations for validation results shall be applied or not
        Returns:
        boolean flag for applying or not applying validation decorations
